db:insert.db:parameterized-query: INSERT INTO users (userName, firstName, lastName, email, pass) VALUES ( #[message.payload.userName], #[message.payload.firstName],#[message.payload.lastName],#[message.payload.email],#[message.payload.pass])

INSERT INTO feedbackform (firstName, lastName, email, subject, mess) VALUES (#[message.payload.firstName],#[message.payload.lastName],#[message.payload.email],#[message.payload.subject],#[message.payload.mess])

db:select.db:parameterized-query: SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = #[message.inboundProperties.'http.query.params'.un] AND pass= #[message.inboundProperties.'http.query.params'.pass]
